Homebrew-Defined -- Male Celestial Victorian Seasoned Scavenger
Attributes (7 Points):
Agility: d8-1 Smarts: d8 Spirit: d6 Strength: d6 Vigor: d6
Attribute Notes: Armor Agility Penalty: -1 Agility (d8 required)
Skills (14 Points):
Appraise: (sma) d6 Healing: (sma) d4 Repair: (sma) d4
Athletics: (agi) d6-1 Notice: (sma) d8+2 Stealth: (agi) d6-1
Common Knowledge: (sma) d4 Occult: (sma) d6 Survival: (sma) d4
Fighting: (agi) d4-1 Persuasion: (spi) d6
Skill Notes:
Alertness: +2 Notice
Armor Agility Penalty: -1 Agility-linked skills (d8 required)
Attractive: +1 Performance (attracted target)/+1 Persuasion (attracted target)
Gullible: -2 to detect lies
Thin Skinned: -2 vs. Taunt
Size: 0
Advances: 4 Improvement Points: 12 Improvement Points Allocation: Attribute: 4; Edge: 6; Skill: 2
Features
Edges (3 points): Alertness; Arcane Background (Necromancy); Flail Expert Hindrances: Driven; Enemy; Gullible; Thin Skinned Celestial Abilities: Attractive; Code Of Honor+; Flight; Vow+
Feature Notes:
Code Of Honor+: Always insists on acting nobly
Driven: Personal goal affects decision-making
Enemy: Individual or remote group wants character eliminated
Vow+: Has strict restrictions on behavior and decisions
Combat
Parry: 7 (4) Cover: 2 Toughness: 8 (3) Pace/Run: 5/+d6
Armor: Brigandine Shield: Medium Steel Shield Weapons: Boomerang (d6+d4 R5"); Knife (d6+d4 R3"); Survival Knife (d6+d4); Unarmed (d6+d0)
Combat Notes:
Armor Pace Penalty: -1 Pace (d8 minimum required)
Fighting Parry Modifier: +1 Parry
Vigor Toughness Modifier: +3
Flail Expert: Flail attacks ignore foe shield bonus to Toughness
Arcana
Powers: Borrow Trait: (2 PP) RTouch Self can use target's score in 1 trait for 5 rd (+2 PP/Additional trait)
